vote.title: Authorize (1) the first of two permitted ten year renewals with the North Texas Municipal Water District to transport North Texas Municipal Water District owned water supply from Lake Fork to Lake Tawakoni for the period October 14, 2025 through October 13, 2035; and (2) an amendment to reflect the terms of the Sabine River Authority Contract with the North Texas Municipal Water District - Estimated Annual Revenue: $3,462,101.65 (at current untreated water transportation rate)
vote.description: Authorize (1) the first of two permitted ten year renewals with the North Texas Municipal Water District to transport North Texas Municipal Water District owned water supply from Lake Fork to Lake Tawakoni for the period October 14, 2025 through October 13, 2035; and (2) an amendment to reflect the terms of the Sabine River Authority Contract with the North Texas Municipal Water District - Estimated Annual Revenue: $3,462,101.65 (at current untreated water transportation rate)
